paragraphs.text:
%md
### Create a dataframe from Google Analytics data of Hello HDP tutorial

result.msg: Create a dataframe from Google Analytics data of Hello HDP tutorial

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType
schema = StructType([       
                      
  StructField("Page",                   StringType()),  
  StructField("Organization",           StringType()),
  StructField("Pageviews",              StringType()),
  StructField("Unique Pageviews",       StringType()),
  StructField("AverageTime",            StringType()),
  StructField("Entrances",              StringType()),
  StructField("Bounce Rate",            StringType()),
  StructField("% Exit",                 StringType()),
  StructField("Page Value",             StringType())
])

helloworld_df = sqlContext.read\
                    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")\
                    .schema(schema)\
                    .option("header", "true")\
                    .option("delimiter", ",")\
                    .load("/tmp/hello-world.csv")
helloworld_df.show(truncate=False)
helloworld_df.cache()

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
cleansed_helloworld=helloworld_df.select('*',regexp_replace('Pageviews','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Pageviews1')).drop('Pageviews')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.select('*',regexp_replace('Unique Pageviews','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Unique Pageviews1')).drop('Unique Pageviews')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.select('*',regexp_replace('Entrances','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Entrances1')).drop('Entrances')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.withColumnRenamed('Pageviews1','Pageviews')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.withColumnRenamed('Unique Pageviews1','Unique PageViews')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.withColumnRenamed('Entrances1','Entrances')
cleansed_helloworld=cleansed_helloworld.select('*',regexp_replace('Page','hortonworks.com/hadoop-tutorial/','').alias('Tutorial_Name')).drop('Page')
cleansed_helloworld.registerTempTable("cleansed_helloworld")
cleansed_helloworld.show(truncate=False)

paragraphs.text:
%md
### Create a dataframe from Google Analytics data of Learning the Ropes of Hortonworks Sandbox tutorial

result.msg: Create a dataframe from Google Analytics data of Learning the Ropes of Hortonworks Sandbox tutorial

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType
schema = StructType([       
                      
  StructField("Page",                   StringType()),  
  StructField("Organization",           StringType()),
  StructField("Pageviews",              StringType()),
  StructField("Unique Pageviews",       StringType()),
  StructField("AverageTime",            StringType()),
  StructField("Entrances",              StringType()),
  StructField("Bounce Rate",            StringType()),
  StructField("% Exit",                 StringType()),
  StructField("Page Value",             StringType())
])

learningropes_df = sqlContext.read\
                    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")\
                    .schema(schema)\
                    .option("header", "true")\
                    .option("delimiter", ",")\
                    .load("/tmp/learning-the-ropes.csv")
learningropes_df.show(truncate=False)
learningropes_df.cache()

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
cleansed_learningropes=learningropes_df.select('*',regexp_replace('Pageviews','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Pageviews1')).drop('Pageviews')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.select('*',regexp_replace('Unique Pageviews','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Unique Pageviews1')).drop('Unique Pageviews')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.select('*',regexp_replace('Entrances','\\,','').cast("integer").alias('Entrances1')).drop('Entrances')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.withColumnRenamed('Pageviews1','Pageviews')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.withColumnRenamed('Unique Pageviews1','Unique PageViews')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.withColumnRenamed('Entrances1','Entrances')
cleansed_learningropes=cleansed_learningropes.select('*',regexp_replace('Page','hortonworks.com/hadoop-tutorial/','').alias('Tutorial_Name')).drop('Page')
cleansed_learningropes.registerTempTable("cleansed_learningropes")
cleansed_learningropes.show(truncate=False)
